long_description: Super-soft and about as fluffy as it gets, the Patagonia Pelage fleece jacket is made of curly, 100% polyester high-pile fleece. A high collar and asymmetric closure add snappy swing-coat style. Luciously soft polyester fleece fabric and a high, fleece-lined shawl collar provide warmth. The Patagonia Pelage fleece jacket features 2-button closure and 2 on-seam handwarmer pockets.
short_description: Super-soft and about as fluffy as it gets, the Patagonia Pelage fleece jacket is made of curly, 100% polyester high-pile fleece. A high collar and asymmetric closure add snappy swing-coat style.
subcategory: Rainwear And Outerwear -- Boys And Girls
